mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM masterpiece WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT p.masterpiece_id, p.title, p.content, p.member_id, m.nickName, p.file_name FROM masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.member_id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
SELECT p.masterpiece_id, p.title, p.content, p.member_id, m.nickName, p.file_name FROM masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.member_id DESC
SELECT p.masterpiece_id, p.title, p.content, p.member_id, m.nickName FROM masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.masterpiece_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO masterpiece (title, content, country, artist, age, file_name, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{country}, #{artist}, #{age}, #{file_name}, #{member_id})
